summary: Journey is an American rock band formed in 1973 in San Francisco. The current members include Neal Schon (the only original member), Jonathan Cain, Jason Derlatka, Deen Castronovo, Todd Jensen, and Arnel Pineda. They were most popular between 1978 and 1987, with hits like "Don't Stop Believin'" and "Open Arms." Their album "Escape" was their most successful, reaching number one on the Billboard charts. Journey has sold over 100 million records worldwide and was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2017.
title: Journey (band)
